Name: French Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Gold rum (1-3 years old pot & column blend)
20 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: A classic Daiquiri made fruity with the addition of black raspberry liqueur and pineapple juice.
History: A riff on the French Martini created in 2009 by yours truly for Charlotte Ashburner, then UK brand manager of Chambord liqueur . Revisited and rebalanced in July 2024.
Nutrition: One serving of French Daiquiri contains 221 calories
